name: The Basics of Technology
description: This chapter introduces you to the most basic and important machines throughout your earlygame experience

quests.name: Better than Wolves?
quests.description: After your first days in Tutorial Land you are finally able to start with some proper tech!... sort of. The first mod you have to use to progress any further is Better With Mods. Let's start with the basics:

tasks.longDescription: Please fulfill some of the first quests in the farming and foraging chapter.

Those two items allow you some basic ore processing as well as milling up your hemp to fibers. Note that the Hand Crank is very difficult and annoying to power. It is highly suggested to switch to a windmill ASAP
Axles and Gearboxes are the way to transfer BWM's kinetic power. You should make yourself a bunch of them so you can power your millstone automatically

Craft the first half and you will get the other half as reward. It is very painful to make a whole one with that terrible crank. Remember that you can only place 3 axles in a row before you need a gearbox.
